data.title: Ann Thomas, Chief Diversity and Inclusion Officer: Stinson LLP Law Firm
data.meta_description: Ann Thomas directs the firm's diversity and inclusion initiatives and oversees the implementation of the firm's Diversity Action Plan.
data.text:
